summary: A collection of utilities that add observability to Large Language Model (LLM) workflows. It includes a context manager to automatically start and finish tracing sessions, decorators for instrumenting functions with spans, a lightweight logger for LLM events, and an asynchronous task manager that queues and executes tracing-related coroutines. The module handles creation of trace and span identifiers, attribute aggregation, status handling, and asynchronous delivery of tracing data to Agenta’s backend service.
business_intent: To give developers built‑in tracing and monitoring capabilities for LLM applications, enabling easier debugging, performance analysis, and compliance reporting by sending structured trace data to Agenta’s observability platform.
